text: Lourival Júnior de Araújo Lopes (born 19 October 1987), known as Júnior Lopes, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Chonburi as a centre-back.Goiás inicia os trabalhos e apresenta zagueiro Júnior Lopes e lateral Bocão (Goiás starts working and presents stopper Júnior Lopes and full-back Bocão);
